quizzes.title: Sports Quiz: Runescape and Game
quizzes.description: Test your sports knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Sports, world, computing. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: In the RuneScape game, you need to have 80 defence to use Guthix armor.
What was the reward in RuneScapes 2008 Easter Seasonal Event?

options.text: a chocolate sword that you can eat off of 3 times a day healing 10hp
a chocatrice cape that turns you into a wrapped egg
Easter bunny ears that make your speed increase

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: a chocatrice cape that turns you into a wrapped egg

questions.question: In what RuneScape quest do you have to use a friend from the opposite gang?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Shield of Arrav

questions.question: To start the Demon Slayer Quest in RuneScape, you must talk to which one of these?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Gypsy

questions.question: Which of these horror movie based games isnt a PC game?
Which of these games was not developed by New World Computing?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: X-COM: UFO Defense

questions.question: Which of the following is not an adventure game?

options.text: The Nine Lives of the Secret Agent Katt

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Raptor: Call of the Shadows

questions.question: Who created the game Last Half of Darkness?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: William R. Fisher III

questions.question: What is the name of the evil dragon in RuneScape that players have to kill in the Dragon Slayer quest?
Is it true that in the RuneScape game, goblins can be found only in Goblin Village and Goblin Cave?
In the RuneScape game, on the Construction Skillcape emote, the character performing the emote does which of the following?

options.text: Builds a small house around himself
Hammers down nails on a board
Makes a workbench with a saw

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Builds a small house around himself

questions.question: To equip Barrows armour and weapons in RuneScape, you must have an attack and defence level 70.
Which of the following is not a real role-playing game?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Last Guardian

questions.question: In the mime random event in RuneScape, the object is to identify all the mime emotes and get a reward afterwards.
What type of game is Power Rangers Time Force?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: All of these

quizzes.title: Sports Quiz: Game and Power Rangers
quizzes.description: Test your sports knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Sports, collections, kart. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: How many of the following Power Rangers games are for PC: Power Rangers; Power Rangers: Lightspeed Rescue; Power Rangers: Super Legends; Power Rangers Zeo Versus the Machine Empire; Power Rangers: Ninja Storm Double Pack?
The feather item in the game Super Mario Kart helps the racer by jumping.
In Might and Magic 8, which of these classes are unselectable for the main character?
There is a PC port in the first three Timesplitters games.
All of the following are items used in the game Super Mario Kart, for the Super NES, except which one of the following?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: blue shell

questions.question: Do players have lives in the racing game Super Mario Kart?
Joe Satriani was given a special thanks in B.A.T. II.
On the Nintendo 64 version of Mario Kart, Wario replaced which of the following playable characters from the Super NES version?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Koopa Troopa

questions.question: In the game Super Mario Kart, for the Super Nintendo, it is possible to fall off the track.
In Super Mario Kart, the green shell is a heat-seeking missile.
All of the following cups are in the game Super Mario Kart, except which one of these?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Lightning cup

questions.question: In the game Super Mario Kart, how many coins do you receive for placing 1st in a single race?
In the Flower cup, in the game Super Mario Kart, on which track do you start?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Choco Island

questions.question: Excluding collections, how many Might and Magic games were released from 1986 to 2002?
In the game Super Mario Kart, what does the mushroom item do to the racer?

options.text: poisons the racer so they cant steer correctly
gives the racer a short burst of speed
makes the racer large to run over other racers
slows the racer so they dont go as fast

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: gives the racer a short burst of speed

quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Games and Game
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, world, message. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: These two detective brothers appear several times in the Nancy Drew computer games to help Nancy solve mysteries.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Frank and Joe

questions.question: Which of these isnt a game from the Hugo series?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Hugos Castle of Death

questions.question: Which of these isnt a Sega collection for PC?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Sega Genesis Collection

questions.question: Who is the protagonist of the PC game Blood?
Which of these games was developed by New World Computing?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Planets Edge

questions.question: Which of these games isnt an action/adventure hybrid?

options.text: The Nine Lives of the Secret Agent Katt

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Grand Theft Auto

questions.question: What did Nancy Drew find along with a message in the computer game Message in a Haunted Mansion?

options.text: She did not find anything along with the note.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: A shark tooth

questions.question: Which of these games was not developed by Blizzard?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Hammer of the Gods

questions.question: Which of these games is rogue-like?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Ancient Domains of Mystery

questions.question: What do you transform into in stage 4 of Altered Beast?
In which of these games does the player take the role of Kirt?
In the Nancy Drew conputer games, Nancy Drews trusty sidekicks are cousins George Fayne and this slightly plump blonde.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Secrets Can Kill

How many races are there in Star Wars: Galactic Battlegrounds? (With expansion)

quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Game and Wonderland Online
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, scene, game. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: In Wonderland Online, which of these makes your level go up?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Killing monsters

questions.question: In the computer game Warnings at Waverly Academy, what was pictured on Nancy Drews cabin door?

options.text: A butterfly with you and your roommates names in it

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Mr. Mingles, the cat

questions.question: In Wonderland Online it is possible to have a dinosaur as a pet.
What does a mermaid at North Island ask you to fetch for her as a quest in the game Wonderland Online?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: A shell

questions.question: Rick Arlen is known as an arrogant television star from Stay Tuned for Danger, but his picture appears in what place in another Nancy Drew game?

options.text: His picture never appears in another game

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: In a briefcase

questions.question: Which of these characters appears in the Nancy Drew computer game Lights, Camera, Curses!?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Molly McOwens

questions.question: In which of these computer games did Nancy Drew wake up in the middle of the night because of a nightmare?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Ghost of Blackmoor Manor

questions.question: In the computer game The Final Scene, a flashing ring gave Nancy Drew the opportunity to save a friend.
What game starts when you talk to some fierce rabbits at Kelan Village in Wonderland Online?
When your raft gets washed up, what is the place it lands (for the first time) in the game Wonderland Online?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Starter Beach

questions.question: You can ride beasts that you capture in the game Wonderland Online.
The wolf in the computer game White Wolf of Icicle Creek was named Isis.
In the Nancy Drew computer game Ghost Dogs of Moon Lake, what is the rangers last name?

options.text: His last name was never revealed

questions.question: When you first start Wonderland Online, where do you find yourself?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: On a ship

questions.question: Which one of these is not a jelly monster you can find on North Island in the game Wonderland Online?

quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Characters and Metroid
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, point, game. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: Where does the first game of the Crysis series take place?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Lingshan Islands

questions.question: How many bosses are there in Subspace Emissary in Super Smash Bros Brawl?
Why is Phatoons eye his weak point in the Metroid series?

options.text: He will run away if blinded.
His eye is the only thing that connects him to the material world.
His eye is his only weapon.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: His eye is the only thing that connects him to the material world.

questions.question: What are the bosses in the first Metroid game?

options.text: Alpha Metroid, Gamma Metroid, Zeta Metroid, Omega Metroid, Queen Metroid

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Ridley, Kraid, Mother Brain

questions.question: In the Metroid series, the Vorashs weak point is its eyes.
What is Nightmares main weapon in the Metroid series?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Multi-laser system

questions.question: The Berserker Lord is fought twice in the Metorid series.
Of the Crysis characters below, who is not a member of Raptor Team?
The final boss of Metroid Other M on hard mode is Phantoon.
How many characters are there at the beginning of Super Smash Bros Brawl?
How many Super Smash Bros Brawl characters have 2+ characters in their team?
The Pinnacle of Project Helix is what kind of Phazon Infused Space Pirate?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Omega Pirate

questions.question: How many characters in Super Smash Bros Brawl have the Final Smash Attack of Landmaster?
Chronologically what is the last boss Samus has faced in the Metroid series?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Omega Metroid

questions.question: In Metroid Prime 3: Corruption Samus fights Meta Ridley while falling down which of the following?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Generator Shaft

quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, ship, dies. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: What is the Typhoons Rate of Fire in the Crysis games?

options.text: None, the Typhoon fires a beam that you must focus on the target

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 500 Rounds Per second

questions.question: You can not destroy a round from the Gravity Bomb Launcher in the Crysis games.
What are the only two weapons you can use in Grifball in Halo 4 Multiplayer?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Gravity Hammer and Energy Sword

questions.question: Which city is not a Ceph point of interest in the Crysis game series?
Prophet dies at the beginning of Crysis 2 .
In the Crysis games, Pingers do not fire at Alcatraz when he is cloaked.
In the Crysis games Ceph Organisms are nicknamed Stalkers.
What year was Crysis character Jacob Hargreave born?
What Crysis character founded C.E.L.L?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Jacob Hargreave

questions.question: What is the award you get for infecting every player in Flood mode in Halo 4 Multiplayer?
Which  Halo 4 Multiplayer map has a Mantis being constructed in the center of the map?
Which map is considered as a remake of the much loved Halo 3 map Valhalla?
On what ship does the Halo 4 Multiplayer take place?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: UNSC Infinity

questions.question: You can drop weapons of your choice in Halo 4.
The plasma rifle is the first covenant weapon to be unlocked in the multiplayer mode of Halo 4.
